Package com.redis.riot.cli

Class ProgressStepExecutionListener

java.lang.Object
org.springframework.batch.core.listener.ItemListenerSupport
com.redis.riot.cli.ProgressStepExecutionListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.springframework.batch.core.ItemProcessListener, org.springframework.batch.core.ItemReadListener, org.springframework.batch.core.ItemWriteListener, org.springframework.batch.core.StepExecutionListener, org.springframework.batch.core.StepListener
public class ProgressStepExecutionListener extends org.springframework.batch.core.listener.ItemListenerSupport implements org.springframework.batch.core.StepExecutionListener
Listener tracking writer or step progress with by a progress bar.
Since:
3.1.2
Author:
Julien Ruaux
